title: Why was the AntennaTV network broadcast on WTMV Channel 29 in Odgen added to Time Warner cable in Pender and Columbus County but not added to New Hanover County where the station is licensed? Time Warner customers in Wilmington have been asking for this network for months.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2015/01/doesnt-time-warner-cable-carry-wtmv-channel-29/
